  • Style: Brut - 7 years of aging on the lees

entries.name: Anne Claire Schott, Pét-Nat Rosé 2021 - Glass (1dl)
entries.subTitle: Anne Claire Schott, Pét-Nat - Glass (0.1l)
entries.description:
• Grape variety: 85% Chasselas, 15% Muscat
  • Origin: Neuchâtel, Switzerland
  • Profile: Ripe citrus fruit, yellow apples, Honey & Beewax
  • Style: Natural - dry & fizzy


This creation of art, as Anne-Claire refers to her wines, was produced in Neuchâtel.


Given the heat and the cold winter in this area, the three lakes play an important role in moderating the climate.


All her vineyard work and winemaking techniques are based on biodynamic approaches, which is always resulting in very character driven wines.


This natural fizzy wine impresses with ripe citrus fruit accompanied by dried wildflowers and honey.


This creative craft - is always surprising!

entries.name: Still Water 5dl
entries.subTitle: Water still 0.5l
entries.description:
We serve our water with a premium water dispenser from Brita with the latest technology and allow us to charge you for the water.


Technical precision from Germany for excellent hygiene with the optional HygienePlus system from BRITA, proven in the healthcare sector.


  • A pre-filter removes coarse particles such as sand and protects our devices.
  • A hollow fiber membrane filters microplastics, hormones, pesticides and drug residues, as well as 99.999% of all bacteria and 99.95% of all cysts.
  • Activated carbon filtration removes substances that affect taste and odor.



By switching from bottled mineral water to a piped water dispenser, you can avoid the use of single-use plastic.
